name: Windows 66
description:
A scary game for Mini Jam: 121.

READ BEFORE PLAYING:

The game is most enjoyable with a controller and a mouse.

Use left and right arrow keys to move or use the left joystick of the controller.

Use up and down arrow keys or use the left joystick of the controller to change the direction of gravity.  It take 2 seconds to recharge the gravity warp.

Move the window to move the camera.
